subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: City hammered Newcastle 5-0 and picked up ground on first-place Chelsea, which was tied 1-1 at home by Burnley in a game marked by officiating controversy.
snippet: City hammered Newcastle 5-0 and picked up ground on first-place Chelsea, which was tied 1-1 at home by Burnley in a game marked by officiating controversy.
